channel.title: News Centre | BJSS
channel.description: News from BJSS including stories of organisations we've worked with as well as info on awards, reports and more. Read now.

item.title: BJSS Approved as a Supplier on the Crown Commercial Service’s DOS6 Framework
item.description: BJSS is proud to announce it has been approved as a supplier on the Crown Commercial Service’s (CCS) Digital Outcomes and Specialists 6 (DOS6) framework.
item.content:encoded: BJSS is proud to announce it has been approved as a supplier on the Crown Commercial Service’s (CCS) Digital Outcomes and Specialists 6 (DOS6) framework.
item.dc:creator: Jonny Muir

item.title: BJSS becomes first EMEA AWS Partner to qualify for Data-Driven Everything programme
item.description: BJSS has become the first EMEA organisation to successfully complete a delivery in the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Data-Driven Everything (D2E) Programme. The programme helps organisations become more data-driven through rapid, scalable successes that lead to early gains in key business outcomes. In an ever-evolving business landscape, making data-driven decisions is no longer a ‘nice to have’, it is a business necessity – 86% of businesses want to be data-driven, but only 37% have been successful.
item.content:encoded: BJSS has become the first EMEA organisation to successfully complete a delivery in the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Data-Driven Everything (D2E) Programme. The programme helps organisations become more data-driven through rapid, scalable successes that lead to early gains in key business outcomes. In an ever-evolving business landscape, making data-driven decisions is no longer a ‘nice to have’, it is a business necessity – 86% of businesses want to be data-driven, but only 37% have been successful.
item.dc:creator: Jonny Muir

item.title: BJSS Included on the Crown Commercial Service’s Latest G-Cloud 13 Framework
item.description: BJSS today announced it has been approved as a supplier on the G-Cloud 13 framework, the Crown Commercial Service’s (CCS) online catalogue where public sector customers can buy cloud-based computing services. BJSS is a part of Lot 3 for Cloud Support and has also been selected as one of a small number of suppliers for the highly-competitive Lot 4 for large scale transformation initiatives.
item.content:encoded: BJSS today announced it has been approved as a supplier on the G-Cloud 13 framework, the Crown Commercial Service’s (CCS) online catalogue where public sector customers can buy cloud-based computing services. BJSS is a part of Lot 3 for Cloud Support and has also been selected as one of a small number of suppliers for the highly-competitive Lot 4 for large scale transformation initiatives.
item.dc:creator: Jonny Muir

item.title: BJSS Awarded 2022 Global AWS Partner Award
item.description: BJSS recognised as Global Healthcare Partner of the Year, one of many AWS Partners around the globe that help customers drive innovation.
item.content:encoded: BJSS recognised as Global Healthcare Partner of the Year, one of many AWS Partners around the globe that help customers drive innovation.
item.dc:creator: Jonny Muir

item.title: BJSS Secures a Microsoft Solutions Partner Designation for Security
item.description: BJSS today announced it has qualified for a fourth Microsoft Solutions Partner designation – this time for Security. The accreditation means BJSS customers will benefit from the company’s broad expertise in safeguarding organisations with integrated security, compliance, and identity solutions.
item.content:encoded: BJSS today announced it has qualified for a fourth Microsoft Solutions Partner designation – this time for Security. The accreditation means BJSS customers will benefit from the company’s broad expertise in safeguarding organisations with integrated security, compliance, and identity solutions.
item.dc:creator: Adam Roche

item.title: BJSS Qualifies for Three Microsoft Solutions Partner Designations
item.description: BJSS today announced it is amongst the first group of Microsoft Cloud partners to qualify for Solutions Partner designation – reinforcing the company’s commitment to delivering outstanding customer outcomes using in-demand Microsoft Cloud solutions.
item.content:encoded: BJSS today announced it is amongst the first group of Microsoft Cloud partners to qualify for Solutions Partner designation – reinforcing the company’s commitment to delivering outstanding customer outcomes using in-demand Microsoft Cloud solutions.
item.dc:creator: Adam Roche

item.title: BJSS announces plans to expand into Ireland with the establishment of a European business and delivery centre in Dublin
item.description: Aligned with its ambitious international growth strategy, BJSS, the leading technology consultancy for business, has today announced plans to establish a new delivery centre in Dublin, which will lead to the creation of 75 new roles.
item.content:encoded: Aligned with its ambitious international growth strategy, BJSS, the leading technology consultancy for business, has today announced plans to establish a new delivery centre in Dublin, which will lead to the creation of 75 new roles.
item.dc:creator: Adam Roche

item.title: Global Design & Innovation Consultancy, SPARCK, Announces its Sponsorship of the Design Thinking Conference in Austin, Texas
item.description: SPARCK, alongside its parent technology consultancy BJSS, today announces it is sponsoring the Design Thinking conference in Austin, Texas, from the 26th-28th September 2022. This is the first time SPARCK has sponsored the event, giving event delegates access to the company’s market-leading design consultants.
item.content:encoded: SPARCK, alongside its parent technology consultancy BJSS, today announces it is sponsoring the Design Thinking conference in Austin, Texas, from the 26th-28th September 2022. This is the first time SPARCK has sponsored the event, giving event delegates access to the company’s market-leading design consultants.
item.dc:creator: Adam Roche

item.title: Forbes recognises BJSS as one of the World's Best Management Consulting Firms in 2022
item.description: In collaboration with Statista, Forbes has identified BJSS as one of the world's leading consulting companies in its inaugural World's Best Management Consulting Firms report. The list recognises the world's top 230 most recommended management consulting firms. BJSS has ranked as one of the leading consultancies in Healthcare, Energy, Commodities & Utilities, Consumer Goods & Retail, and I.T. Strategy & Implementation.
item.content:encoded: In collaboration with Statista, Forbes has identified BJSS as one of the world's leading consulting companies in its inaugural World's Best Management Consulting Firms report. The list recognises the world's top 230 most recommended management consulting firms. BJSS has ranked as one of the leading consultancies in Healthcare, Energy, Commodities & Utilities, Consumer Goods & Retail, and I.T. Strategy & Implementation.
item.dc:creator: Adam Roche

item.title: Leeds-headquartered technology consultancy BJSS sets out to restore green space in the Yorkshire Dales
item.description: At a time when climate change and the depletion of natural green spaces are of great concern, BJSS is looking at ways they can provide solutions.
item.content:encoded: At a time when climate change and the depletion of natural green spaces are of great concern, BJSS is looking at ways they can provide solutions.
item.author: chloe.coggins@bjss.com (Chloe Coggins)
